titlestmt.titleproper: Guide to the Nooksack River Bridge photographs 1991
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Rozlind Koester

publicationstmt.publisher: Western Washington University, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies

profiledesc.creation: Finding aid encoded by Rozlind Koester 2012
profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS ( Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

did.abstract: These photographs document the Nooksack River Bridge at Everson, Washington. They were taken in 1991 by the Washington State Deptartment of Transportation at the request of Mr. Leonard T. Garfield of the Office of Archaeology and Historic Preservation.

scopecontent.p: These photographs document the Nooksack River Bridge at Everson, Washington. They were taken in 1991 by the Washington State Deptartment of Transportation at the request of Mr. Leonard T. Garfield of the Office of Archaeology and Historic Preservation.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open to the public.

prefercite.p: Nooksack River Bridge photographs, Center for Pacific Northwest Studies, Western Libraries Archives & Special Collections, Western Washington University, Bellingham WA 98225-9123.

processinfo.head: About Harmful Language and Content
processinfo.p: To learn more about problematic content in our collections, collection description and teaching tools (including how to provide feedback or request dialogue on this topic), see the following Statement About Potentially Harmful Language and Content

acqinfo.p: Donated by the Washington State Department of Transportation's Engineering Field Office in 1991.

controlaccess.p: This collection is indexed under the following headings in the online catalog. Researchers desiring materials about related topics, persons, or places should search the catalog using these headings.
